name: Ostinato
description: The Ostinato is a medium-sized aberration characterized by its chaotic and unpredictable nature, often using psychic manipulation and sound-based abilities to influence its surroundings.
memorable: Its ability to meld into the minds of humanoids with an alluring tune makes it a truly unique threat.
goals: To manipulate others and create a disorienting musical environment.
relations: Typically found alone or in the company of other aberrations, possibly using minions to further its chaotic goals.
environment: Not commonly found in typical environments, usually dwelling in places where chaos reigns or deep within psychic maelstroms.
strengths: High speed allows for effective maneuvering on the battlefield; immunity to poison and several conditions.
attacks: Utilizes two Cacophony Burst attacks, which deliver thunder damage and can also merge with humanoid hosts.
most_powerful_ability: Contagious Tune can affect multiple creatures within a radius, dealing significant psychic damage and gaining temporary hit points.
senses: Possesses darkvision and telepathy, enabling it to communicate mentally with others.
skills: Excels in perception, allowing it to detect the environment effectively.
additional_information: Incurs force damage if it ends turns inside objects due to Incorporeal Movement.
Can become invisible, enhancing its tactical advantages.
Magic Resistance grants an edge against spellcasters.
Cannot be targeted while merged with its host.
Deafened creatures are immune to its sound-based abilities.
test_queries: medium size aberration with sound attacks
monster that manipulates with catchy tunes
creature immune to poison and paralysis
